--- title: Rural economy keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Exploring economic dynamics in rural areas of the United States." description: "Exploring economic dynamics in rural areas of the United States." nb_path: "nbs/index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Research team

  • Anton Babkin (UConn)
  • Richard A. Dunn (UConn)
  • Brent Hueth (UW-Madison)
  • Thomas Flory (UW-Madison)

Installation

  1. Clone this git project.
  2. Create and activate conda environment from environment.yml file.
  3. Pull resources from shared repository.

Project structure

  • InfoGroup preparation: validate, clean, convert
  • ERS codes preparation: download, combine, format
    • Other geo codes will be added as well
  • Rurality: merge ERS codes into InfoGroup
  • Dynamics: summary statistics by geography

Resource repository

List of registered resources

{% raw %} 
from rurec import resources

for r in resources.get():
    print(f'{r.key:30}{r.description}')

ers/ruc                       ERS Rural-Urban Continuum codes - data
ers/ruc_doc                   ERS Rural-Urban Continuum codes - documentation
ers/ruca                      ERS Rural-Urban Commuting Area codes - data
ers/ruca_doc                  ERS Rural-Urban Commuting Area codes - documentation
ers/ui                        ERS Urban Influence codes - data
ers/ui_doc                    ERS Urban Influence codes - documentation
infogroup/full                Processed InfoGroup data, all years, partitioned parquet
infogroup/orig/1997           Original unprocessed InfoGroup data, 1997
